items.title: You can now access all Babbel language lessons through this exclusive offer from StackSocial
items.summary:
Learning a new language is tough, but some apps might be making it harder than it needs to be. Instead of rote memorization and hours of boring grammar exercises, try an app with a more practical approach. Babbel is a trusted language-learning tool with beginner-friendly lessons in 14 different languages, and you can get a lifetime subscription for only $159 (reg. $646.20), but that won’t last much longer.
